sql4cds.description: Query and modify data in Microsoft Dataverse / Dynamics 365 Sales / CRM instances using standard SQL query syntax
sql4cds.logDebugInfo.description: [Optional] Log debug output to the VS Code console (Help -> Toggle Developer Tools)
sql4cds.configuration.title: SQL 4 CDS configuration
sql4cds.enabled.description: [Optional] Enable SQL 4 CDS support (currently in development)
sql4cds.debugSourcePath.description: [Optional] Path to the source directory of the SQL 4 CDS Tools Service, for debugging
sql4cds.useDebugSource.description: [Optional] Enable running the SQL 4 CDS extension via the path set in SQL 4 CDS.debugSourcePath
sql4cds.enableStartupDebugging.descripti: [Optional] Whether to make the SQL 4 CDS Tools Service wait for a debugger to attach when starting
sql4cds.useTdsEndpoint.description: Use the TDS Endpoint where possible to execute queries
sql4cds.blockDeleteWithoutWhere.descript: Prevent DELETE queries that do not have a WHERE clause
sql4cds.blockUpdateWithoutWhere.descript: Prevent UPDATE queries that do not have a WHERE clause
sql4cds.batchSize.description: Number of requests to make in each batch
sql4cds.maxDegreeOfParallelism.descripti: Maximum number of requests to send in parallel
sql4cds.useLocalTimeZone.description: Use local time zone for date/time values
sql4cds.bypassCustomPlugins.description: Bypass custom plugins for INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE requests
sql4cds.insertWarnThreshold.description: Warn when inserting more than _ records
sql4cds.updateWarnThreshold.description: Warn when updating more than _ records
sql4cds.deleteWarnThreshold.description: Warn when deleting more than _ records
sql4cds.selectLimit.description: Limit results to _ records (0 for unlimited)
sql4cds.maxRetrievesPerQuery.description: Maximum retrievals per query (0 for unlimited)
sql4cds.connectionOptions.user.descripti: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting to the data source
sql4cds.connectionOptions.password.descr: Indicates the password to be used when connecting to the data source
sql4cds.connectionOptions.clientid.descr: Client ID to use for server-to-server authentication
sql4cds.connectionOptions.clientsecret.d: Client Secret to use for server-to-server authentication
sql4cds.connectionOptions.redirectUrl.de: Redirect URL to use for server-to-server authentication
sql4cds.resourceDeployment.description: Create an Azure Database for SQL 4 CDS flexible server - a fully managed SQL 4 CDS database as a service on Azure.
sql4cds.resourceDeployment.helpTexts.tem: Azure Database for SQL 4 CDS Flexible Server is a relational database service powered by the SQL 4 CDS community edition. It's a fully managed database as a service offering that can handle mission-critical workloads with predictable performance and dynamic scalability. Additionally, it is designed for more granular control and flexibility over database management functions and configuration settings. {0}
